remarks: Show that ~ df-sb and ~ df-sbc are equivalent when the class term ` A ` in ~ df-sbc is a setvar variable.  This theorem lets us reuse theorems based on ~ df-sb for proofs involving ~ df-sbc .  (Contributed by NM, 31-Dec-2016.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement: sbsbc $p |- ( [ y / x ] ph <-> [. y / x ]. ph ) $.
